TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Status extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains classes that provide objects for the parts of the status bar. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Status> class provides a foundation in which the following classes are defined:
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Status.Bar>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Status.Gripper>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Status.GripperPane>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Status.Pane>
Each of these classes provides a property that returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for the status bar part specified by the class name.
